mapper.select: SELECT t.SCHEMA_NAME FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA t WHERE t.SCHEMA_NAME NOT IN ('mysql', 'information_schema', 'sys', 'performance_schema')

SELECT t.table_name code, CONCAT(t.table_name, '(', t.table_comment, ')') name, t.create_time, t.update_time FROM information_schema.tables t
AND t.table_schema = (select database())
AND t.table_schema = #{dbName}
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_gen_table gt WHERE gt.code = t.table_name ) AND t.table_name NOT LIKE 'sys_%' AND t.table_name NOT LIKE 'sharding_%' AND t.table_name NOT LIKE '%dictionaries' AND t.table_name NOT LIKE '%simple_type' AND t.table_name NOT LIKE 'act_%' AND t.table_name NOT LIKE 'flw_%'

SELECT t.table_comment FROM information_schema.tables t
AND t.table_name = #{tableName} AND t.table_schema = (select database())

select column_name, column_comment, column_type, ordinal_position as sort, (case when (is_nullable = 'no' && column_key != 'PRI') then 1 else 0 end) as is_required, (case when column_key = 'PRI' then 1 else 0 end) as is_pk, (case when column_key = 'UNI' then 1 else 0 end) as is_unique, (case when extra = 'auto_increment' then 1 else 0 end) as is_increment from information_schema.columns where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = (#{tableName}) order by ordinal_position
